summary: Fixed sync-products route to use readFile instead of dynamic import. Removed any import statements for data/products.ts. The route now reads the file from filesystem and parses it using Function constructor. Cleared Next.js build cache to ensure changes take effect.
current_status: Sync endpoint fixed - no longer tries to import TS files. Uses readFile to read and parse products.ts at runtime. Build cache cleared. The sync button should now work properly.
